name: spoolman
description: Spoolman is a self-hosted filament spool manager for 3D printers. It tracks remaining filament, costs, and metadata, integrating with print servers like OctoPrint.
features: Filament tracking: Manages 3D printer filament spools with remaining weight.
Cost calculation: Tracks filament costs and calculates print expenses.
Material database: Stores information about filament types, colors, and brands.
Usage logging: Records filament consumption per print job.
Low stock alerts: Notifies when spool weight drops below threshold.
OctoPrint integration: Syncs with OctoPrint for automatic usage tracking.
Barcode labels: Generates barcode labels for spool identification.
Purchase history: Tracks when and where filament was purchased.
Multi-printer support: Manages filament across multiple 3D printers.
Statistics: Displays usage trends and most-used materials.
API access: Integrates with print servers via REST API.
Web interface: Manages spools through browser-based dashboard.
